snippet: Gov. Neil Abercrombie, who called a special session for the bill and has supported gay marriage, has said he will sign it.
abstract: Hawaii State Senate votes 19 to 4 to legalize gay marriage, and Gov Neil Abercrombie says he will sign bill.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Neil Abercrombie, who called a special session for the bill and has supported gay marriage, has said he will sign it.

headline.main: Hawaii: Same-Sex Marriage Bill Goes to Governor
headline.print_headline: Hawaii: Same-Sex Marriage Bill Goes To Governor

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
